name: Peter Singer, Order of Australia
notable_ideas: Equal consideration of interests, Drowning child analogy, Effective altruism, Argument from marginal cases
influences: Charles Darwin· John Stuart Mill · Henry Sidgwick · Jeremy Bentham ' R. M. Hare · Jonathan Glover · Derek Parfit
influenced: Peter Unger· Colin McGinn· Roger Crisp· Dale Jamieson· Gregory Pence· Julian Savulescu· James Rachels· Mylan Engel· Steven Best· Toby Ord· Bill Gates · William MacAskill
alma_mater: University of Melbourne; University College, Oxford
institutions: University College, Oxford, New York University, University of Melbourne, Princeton University, New College of the Humanities
